reviewText: The profile of Tom Dowd reveals a multi-talented man who came to be a sound engineer after working on the Manhattan Project, amazingly in his teenage years, with hopes and ambition to work in the nuclear field. His personal journey shows his early love of music and his skill at producing other talented musicians, over decades. He has a vibrancy of character that shines through in the way he works in the recording studio and recognizes new talent. Quite interesting to hear the interviews of other musicians and their personal experiences with a master producer, who totally enjoyed his career and calling.
